vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.20
§ Adnah = "pleasure"
1) a Manassite who deserted from Saul and joined David at Ziklag
2) a captain in charge of over 300,000 men of Judah in the time of Jehoshaphat
vocabinfos._es_Definition: oficial; en tiempos del rey Josafat \guerrero; tribu de Manasés; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
押拿 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "愉悅"
1) 一位瑪拿西人, 他被掃羅所棄而在洗革拉投入大衛的麾下 (代上 12:20)
2) 約沙法時一位統領卅萬猶大勇士的軍事將領 (代下 17:14)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
押拿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "愉悦"
1) 一位玛拿西人, 他被扫罗所弃而在洗革拉投入大卫的麾下 (代上 12:20)
2) 约沙法时一位统领卅万犹大勇士的军事将领 (代下 17:14)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.17.14
§ Adnah = "pleasure"
1) a Manassite who deserted from Saul and joined David at Ziklag
2) a captain in charge of over 300,000 men of Judah in the time of Jehoshaphat
